channel.title: [Delta] BarrenScape
channel.description:
[ul][center][b]What is BarrenScape?[/b] [i]Barrenscape is going to be a development of a deltascape server, that will be cleaned and made blank.[/center]
[center][b]What are the main goals?[/b] To remove all the unneeded things from this deltasape server.[/center] [center][b]What are you going to remove?[/b] See below[/center]
[center][b]What will it be like when it's done?[/b] [i]It will be like a really barren server, the only content that will probably be still there is combat.[/i][/center]
[B]Progress[/b] Means it has been removed / completed Means it has been started Means it has not been started [b]Things to delete[/b] [list][li][color=blue]Custom Items, objects, npcs[/li] [li]All skills[/li] [li]Useless methods[/li][/list]
This list will expand alot, it is only like this because I have only just started on this server.
[b]What it will contain[/b] [list][li]Alot of the sendquest methods that are not being used(showed as the ID)[/li][/list] [li]Running / Walking[/li][/ul]
[li]Friends / Ignores list[/li][/list]
Credits(So far) Runescape Sucks - Cleaning most of the server and the client. Pblord7 - Giving me the file I needed to fix that bad fence glitch.
Any questions, concerns, suggestions? Post them below.

item.title: [Delta] BarrenScape
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yeah… I’ve not ever seen a development thread like this one but have seen a few releases from the past, I suppose I’ll keep tabs on this, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] BarrenScape
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

kingman002:

Good luck, even though there are a lot of delta cleaned servers and some of which aren’t cleaned. Are you going to improve delta’s combat as well?

Well, I’ll try to improve the combat. I’m not guaranteeing anything, but at the least I can try.

Edit:

First pic, not anything special, but it’s the old KBD.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] BarrenScape
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[ul][center]What is BarrenScape?
[i]Barrenscape is going to be a development of a deltascape server, that will be cleaned and made blank.[/center]

[center]What are the main goals?
To remove all the unneeded things from this deltasape server.[/center]
[center]What are you going to remove?
See below[/center]

[center]What will it be like when it’s done?
It will be like a really barren server, the only content that will probably be still there is combat.[/center]

Progress
Means it has been removed / completed
Means it has been started
Means it has not been started
Things to delete
[list][li][color=blue]Custom Items, objects, npcs[/li]
[li]All skills[/li]
[li]Useless methods[/li][/list]

This list will expand alot, it is only like this because I have only just started on this server.

What it will contain
[list][li]Alot of the sendquest methods that are not being used(showed as the ID)[/li][/list]
[li]Running / Walking[/li][/ul]

[li]Friends / Ignores list[/li][/list]

Credits(So far)
Runescape Sucks - Cleaning most of the server and the client.
Pblord7 - Giving me the file I needed to fix that bad fence glitch.

Any questions, concerns, suggestions? Post them below.

Read full topic
